snippet: Across the board, Johnny Damon has impressive career numbers — Hall of Fame worthy, he says — reflecting a rare combination of longevity and well-rounded skills.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column observes that Johnny Damon, major league outfielder now with the Cleveland Indians, has impressive career numbers across the board, reflecting a rare combination of longevity and well-rounded skills; notes that Damon himself believes he has earned a spot in the the Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: Across the board, Johnny Damon has impressive career numbers — Hall of Fame worthy, he says — reflecting a rare combination of longevity and well-rounded skills.

headline.seo: Statistics Say Cooperstown, and Johnny Damon Agrees
headline.main: Statistics Say Cooperstown, and Damon Agrees
